name: Watched Shark Tank 13x08 "Wendy's Gnome Shop, Ornament Anchor, The Real Elf, Santa's Enchanted Mailbox"
Shark Tank 13x08 "Wendy's Gnome Shop, Ornament Anchor, The Real Elf, Santa's Enchanted Mailbox"

item.value: Shark Tank 13x08 "Wendy's Gnome Shop, Ornament Anchor, The Real Elf, Santa's Enchanted Mailbox"

content.html:
Holiday cheer heads into the Tank when an entrepreneur from Charlotte, North Carolina, shows her magical designs. A family of entrepreneurs from Milford, Connecticut, return with a product designed to keep your ornaments safe. An Elf from Chicago, Illinois, hopes to spread joy through his personalized digital business. A husband-and-wife duo from Wallingford, Connecticut, pitch their magical product aimed at helping children communicate with the North Pole.

Watched on Trakt
